title: Men's Basketball Hoodie
body_html:
Soft & Breathable – Lightweight fabric keeps you cool and comfortable during workouts or casual wear.
✔ Versatile Style – Perfect for basketball, gym, or everyday streetwear.
✔ Multiple Colors – Available in black, blue, gray, red, yellow, and dark blue to match your style.
✔ True-to-Size Fit – Relaxed fit with a classic cardigan design for easy layering.

Available Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL

Includes: 1x Sweatshirt
